creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
description: Newly lined. Silk embroidery on coarse tan cotton ground. Red dominates. Twelve large circles with 4: borders around circumference. 6.25" embroidered border all four sides. Newer linen lining with 2 adjoining velcro heading bands. Seven vertical panels. Some motifs on border penciled in but not embroidered.
medium: Silk, cotton, linen; continuous-thread couching, chain stitch, open chain stitch
title: Suzani
